name: Particle System (Joan Ginard Mateo)
description:
Description

The main objective is to implement a particle system with two different types of emitters: fountain and cascade. Their parameters have to be user-adjustable from the GUI as well as the emission rate (not less than 100 particles per second) and particle life expectancy (not less than a second).

Usage

Use the GUI to toggle settings.

Technology

C++ with OpenGL

Credits

Marc Molina - Lead Programmer

Joan Ginard - Programmer
